org.convertertopdf.configuration.implementation

Class TxtImageConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.convertertopdf.configuration.Configuration
      • org.convertertopdf.configuration.implementation.TxtImageConfiguration

  • public final class TxtImageConfiguration
extends Configuration
    Utility class for optional settings when converting PDF, TXT and Images (GIF, BMP, PNG, JPEG, TIFF) to PDF.
    Author:
    Thiago Leite e-mail: thiagoleiteecarvalho@gmail.com

      • getPageSize

        public com.lowagie.text.Rectangle getPageSize()
        Gets the configured page size.
        Returns:
        The iText rectangle which represents the page size. The default return is A4.

      • isPortrait

        public boolean isPortrait()
        Gets the configured page orientation.
        Returns:
        True is portrait. False is landscape.
